content.api.paragraph: The API for this site is open and freely available, and is found at {apilink}
content.developers.code.paragraph: The code for both the frontend and the API is open. Find it at {repolink}.
content.developers.code.paragraph2: Feel free to open Issues if you find any technical issues on the site, or on the API.
content.analyze.description: Analyze one or more words in isolation
content.spellcheck.description: Run a spell check for one or multiple words
